tuv.seg: An outline of the different types of employment and how this can affect your employment rights

Cearta fostaíochta oibrithe tí

Cad is oibrí tí ann?
Outline of the employment rights of people working in private homes
Sracthuairisc ar chearta fostaíochta daoine a oibríonn i dtithe príobháideacha
Agency workers have rights under certain employment legislation
Tá cearta ag oibrithe gníomhaireacht faoi reachtaíocht fostaíochta áirithe
Find out more about these and the Protection of Employees (Temporary Agency Work) Act 2012
Faigh amach tuilleadh fúthu seo agus faoin Acht um Chosaint Fostaithe (Obair Ghníomhaireachta Shealadach) 2012
A definition of what a part-time worker is, an overview of part-time workers and explanation of the difference between a part-time worker and a casual worker
Míniú ar céard is oibrí páirtaimseartha, léargas ginearálta ar oibrithe páirtaimseartha agus léiriú ar an difear idir oibrí páirtaimseartha agus oibrí ócáideach
Employment rights of part-time workers
Cearta fostaíochta fostaithe páirtaimseartha
Part-time workers have certain employment rights under the Protection of Employees (Part-Time Work) Act 2001
Tá cearta fostaíochta áirithe ag oibrithe páirtaimseartha faoin tAcht um Chosaint Fostaithe (Obair Pháirtaimseartha) 2001
